info.title: Hotels.ng API
info.description:
Welcome to the Hotels.ng API! You can use our API to integrate within you applications.

NOTE



All throughout this documentation every method has a "Switch to Console or Switch to Example Option". This functionality will let your paste your Access Token (and other pertinent parameters) and make a live request to the API.

tags.description: Access to all bookings related things

get.description:
Hotels.ng uses Client id and Client Secret to allow access to the api.The client id and secret would provide an access token which would now grant you access to all our Hotels.ng endpoints.
For the Hng Internship,
The default Client_id is wLV9nF9J8uo0SuaYXl7wCc9RV
The default Client_secret is YBiqbzOpma9zSUd3txXSCKQvcdZuPDcrS0AVGp9v
The default grantType is client_credentials
For a list of scopes, see the descriptions for the endpoint you are consuming for available scopes. It is advised to use only scope for the endpoint you are consuming
Multiple scopes can be combined with ',' as a delimeter.

parameters.name: grant_type
parameters.description: level of access the api supports

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: the id of the user requesting the api

data.name: bimbo,
data.title: okay,
data.comment: I enjoyed my stay, the service was very good and the rooms were quite comfortable. There was no such thing as being unsatisfied. The staffs were prompt with all the services,
